title: GPT Query - Prompting from Blueprint
description: Seamlessly integrate OpenAI's GPT with Unreal Engine Blueprints to harness the power of advanced AI language processing. Input your data and prompts, then utilize the dynamic string results to elevate your project's functionality.
longDescription:
Introducing GPT Query: Unleashing the Power of AI in Unreal Engine

GPT Query is a groundbreaking tool that integrates OpenAI's revolutionary GPT (Generative Pretrained Transformer) directly into Unreal Engine, providing developers with the ability to leverage the latest advancements in natural language processing (NLP) within their blueprints. This plug-and-play solution bridges the gap between complex AI algorithms and the intuitive blueprint system of Unreal Engine, making it accessible to game developers, interactive experience designers, and simulation creators.


What is GPT Query?

GPT Query is an Unreal Engine plugin that allows you to prompt OpenAI's GPT models with custom data inputs and generate rich, context-aware content. Whether you're developing an NPC's dialogue, creating dynamic narrative content, or need real-time language processing for user inputs, GPT Query empowers you with AI that understands and generates human-like text.


Key Features:

  • Blueprint-Friendly: Designed with a simple interface, GPT Query allows you to trigger AI responses directly from blueprints—no coding required.
  • Real-Time Processing: Get immediate AI-generated text based on the prompts and data you feed into the system, perfect for applications requiring on-the-fly content creation.
  • Versatile Applications: Use the plugin for a range of functionalities, from enhancing NPC interactions and user input parsing to generating dynamic content for storytelling and world-building.
  • Customizable Prompts: Tailor your prompts to suit your project's needs. GPT Query can handle diverse scenarios, adapting its output to the context you define.
  • Developer Support: Gain access to comprehensive documentation and support to integrate GPT Query seamlessly into your workflow.


Setting Expectations:

GPT Query is built to be a flexible tool in a developer's arsenal, but it's essential to understand the capabilities and limitations of AI-powered content generation. While GPT models are powerful, the quality and relevance of the output depend significantly on the input prompts. We encourage you to experiment with different prompt structures to discover the full potential of GPT Query in your projects.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Input any Data and a Prompt (both String)
  •  Output, as String, the GPT completion


Number of Blueprints: 1

Number of C++ Classes: 1

Network Replicated: (No)

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows
